summary:
Mechanical engineer specialized in designing & manufacturing all kind mechanical components. I have complete my studies in 2011 with bachelor degree in mechanical engineering (Manufacturing and design engineer) certified in ISET Nabeul of Tunisia.
I have couple of years experience within different companies and sectors, and right now I`m working within Tata Steel in the Netherlands as project engineer since 07-2021.
For more information you can contact me here after a chat on LinkIdin or on my email address bougrinehatem@hotmail.com
